title: Let’s Get This Party Started. But First, Here’s a Swab.
sub_head: This year’s hottest hostess gift is a negative Covid-19 test result
body:
When guests arrive at Jeanne Sauvage’s home in Seattle for Thanksgiving dinner this year, they will have to take a rapid Covid-19 test on her front porch before entering.
“My husband and I have asthma and I have an autoimmune disorder, and so we just figured, why take the risk?” says Ms. Sauvage, who got her booster shot in early November and is concerned about breakthrough infections.
